movie.title: RED
movie.writer: Jon Hoeber (screenplay), Erich Hoeber (screenplay), Warren Ellis (graphic novel), Cully Hamner (graphic novel)
movie.actors: Bruce Willis, Mary-Louise Parker, Heidi von Palleske, Karl Urban
movie.plot: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 18 nominations.
